title: Cooking Class - Healthy Holiday Gifts
desc: We all love those homemade treats we get around the holidays.? What we don't like are those extra pounds they can put on! ? ? ? ? Upgrade holiday gift giving with treats that will warm the heart and heal the body.? ? ? Learn how to make easy, nutritious, and delicious holiday inspired gifts and leave with a few to put under someone's tree!? ? ? Menu ? Dark Chocolate Holiday Bark ? Coconutty Trail Mix (Gluten Free) ? Homemade Herbal Tea Blends ? ? ? Includes: 2-3 gifts of each item, dinner soup, & wine (and corny holiday music)
